- Read the tasks from `todo.txt`. Complete each task one by one in order. After finishing a task, mark it as done in the file (e.g., prepend "[DONE]") and move to the next task. Repeat until all tasks in the file are marked as done. If a task fails or is unclear, skip it, log the issue in `errors.log`, and proceed to the next task.
